name: Highway Star Getaway!
description:
Part 4 Spoilers

Use A and D to move sideways.
Use J to attack with Crazy Diamond
Use K to restore obstacles with Crazy Diamond.
Restore obstacles after you pass them to gain distance from Highway Star.
Survive long enough to drive Josuke to the hospital.

Credits 

CJ Axisa: Design & Programming
Nick Vallejos: Degisn, Programming, & Art
Ed Gibbes: Art

Sound effects from Eyes of Heaven .
